Articles.Content:
A brand new fighter of mine which is capable to carrying 4 flat I-Beam missiles and 1 good ol' SRB to LKO. Barely gets into orbit, but it does the job. Best to have a refueling station in LKO.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Instructions:

Get to 20 km whilst steadily gaining speed. Once you've got around 800 units of liquid fuel left, begin your ascent to 26 km or higher (the higher, the better, but don't lose too much speed!), whilst climbing, keep an eye on your fuel levels, at 720 liquid fuel units you must switch modes on the S.A.B.R.E. engines by pressing "1". Keep burning until your apokey reached the 70-80 km range, then time warp to the apokey and begin circularizing your orbit. By this stage, you will have run out of most if not all your fuel, so to rendezvous with a refueling station you'll have to use your RCS. Good luck!

Craft file!

SSTO Fighter Mk I

Edited September 10, 2015 by AlexanderTeaH
I've added an imgur album to better show off the craft.
Nicely done! Really unique design and concept, dude.
